overview.Institute Name: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Una
overview.address: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Saloh, Una, Himachal Pradesh - 177209

mode_of_admission.mode_of_admission: Candidates must appear for the JEE (Main) exam and either secure at least 75% marks (65% for SC/ST/PwD) in Class XII or be within the category-wise top 20 percentile in their respective Class XII board examination. For more details, refer to the JEE Main Performance Criteria in Class XII.
